item.description:
Enjoy a two-hour train ride to the banks of the Cape Cod Canal while enjoying a sumptuous brunch prepared by our acclaimed culinary staff, aboard an elegant, climate controlled, vintage dining cars. The Sunday Brunch Train departs from the Hyannis Station at 11:30 am.

 

Fare includes gourmet brunch and two hour train ride.

Adult Fares: $42.95

Price does not include Massachusetts Meals Tax (6.25%), $2 fuel surcharge, beverages or gratuity - beverages and gratuity are payable on board the train. If you are happy with your service, we suggest you base your gratuity on 18%-20% of the GRAND total of your bill. For parties of 6 or more an 18% gratuity will be automatically added on to your check. A selection of fine wines and full bar is available from your table, to compliment your fine dining experience.

Parking fee applies.

 

Reserve in Advance by sending me a check or money order in the amount of $42.95 payable to Sharon Christensen by May 29th so I can purchase the tickets for the group!  My address to send payment is: 31 Brookshire Road, Hyannis, MA 02601.  If you prefer, you can make payment through Paypal on our Girl's Just Wanna Have Fun Meetup Website!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Brunch on the Cape Cod Central Railroad!
